title: FS: A Couple of Tough Recruit T207s - Perdue & Snodgrass **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: A Couple of Tough Recruit T207s - Perdue & Snodgrass **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following pair of T207 cards available for sale. These are two of the tougher Recruit class cards in the set.  These two don't come up for sale too often.

I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.


Prices are delivered.

Perdue - $65 - (please note that the vertical line that appears down the right center of the card is on the scan and NOT on the card)

Snodgrass (PSA 2) - $35 (scratch across the face is on the holder and NOT on the card)
Bump for a price drop on these two tough Recruits.  Thanks for looking!
